titleStmt.title: Aphorisms upon the new way of improving cyder, or making cyder-royal lately discovered for the good of those kingdoms and nations that are beholden to others, and pay dear for wine ... : to which are added, certain expedients concerning raising and planting of apple-trees, gooseberry-trees, &c. with respect to cheapness, expedition, certain growing, and fruitfulness, beyond what hath hitherto been yet made known / by Richard Haines.
titleStmt.author: Haines, Richard, 1633-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Larkin for the author ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
